description:
This seems to be just a XML serialization bug for the v1.0 api.

When calling the nova api v1.1 the api return correctly.

Example:
$ curl -H "X-Auth-Token: $TOKEN" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H"X_AUTH_PROJECT_ID: $TENANT" http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors

<flavors xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <flavor id="3" name="m1.medium">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/3" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/3" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="2" name="m1.small">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/2" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/2" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="4" name="m1.large">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/4" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/4" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="6" name="m1.xxlarge">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/6" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/6" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="1" name="m1.tiny">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/1" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/1" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="5" name="m1.xlarge">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/5" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/5" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
</flavors>


When calling the nova api v1.0 the same xml is not returned.

Example:
$ curl -H "X-Auth-Token: $TOKEN" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H"X_AUTH_PROJECT_ID: $TENANT" http://localhost:8774/v1.0/flavors

<flavors xmlns="http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/v1.0">
    <flavor>
        <id>
            3
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.medium
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            2
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.small
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            4
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.large
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            6
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.xxlarge
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            1
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.tiny
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            5
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.xlarge
        </name>
    </flavor>
</flavors>
title: nova api v1.0 call serializing xml has no attributes

comments.content:
This seems to be just a XML serialization bug for the v1.0 api.

When calling the nova api v1.1 the api return correctly.

Example:
$ curl -H "X-Auth-Token: $TOKEN" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H"X_AUTH_PROJECT_ID: $TENANT" http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors

<flavors xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <flavor id="3" name="m1.medium">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/3" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/3" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="2" name="m1.small">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/2" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/2" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="4" name="m1.large">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/4" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/4" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="6" name="m1.xxlarge">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/6" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/6" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="1" name="m1.tiny">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/1" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/1" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
    <flavor id="5" name="m1.xlarge">
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers/flavors/5" rel="self"/>
        <atom:link href="http://localhost:8774/servers/flavors/5" rel="bookmark"/>
    </flavor>
</flavors>


When calling the nova api v1.0 the same xml is not returned.

Example:
$ curl -H "X-Auth-Token: $TOKEN" -H "Accept: application/xml" -H"X_AUTH_PROJECT_ID: $TENANT" http://localhost:8774/v1.0/flavors

<flavors xmlns="http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/v1.0">
    <flavor>
        <id>
            3
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.medium
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            2
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.small
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            4
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.large
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            6
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.xxlarge
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            1
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.tiny
        </name>
    </flavor>
    <flavor>
        <id>
            5
        </id>
        <name>
            m1.xlarge
        </name>
    </flavor>
</flavors>
